title: Huge 2 Story Apartment! Low Deposit! Great location!
posting_body: ["Don't miss out on this incredible apartment and price!", 'ONE LEFT!', ' Gated community, pool, gym, community room, gourmet Starbucks coffee machine.', 'Close to restaurants, food trucks, shopping and I-95.', 'Short drive to the beach, I -95, cruise port and airport.', 'Luxury at its finest!', 'This sophisticated apartment will have you at hello!', 'Split floor plan.', 'Great location and only 5 years old', 'Bonzi Xaykosy', 'Realtor ® Lokation', 'show contact info', 'Limited Time Offer- Prices subject to change - Floor plans may vary', 'Rent:', '$2800', 'Deposit:', '$1000', 'Bedrooms:', '2 Bedroom', 'Bathrooms:', '2 Bathrooms', 'Parking:', 'Included', 'Lease Duration:', '12 months', 'Pets Policy:', 'Pet Friendly', 'Laundry:', 'In Unit', 'Reference:', 'State', 'PLEASE NO REALTOR CALLS!', 'Call me for any of the following areas/Properties Fort Lauderdale / Fort Lauderdale Beach/ Broward/ Plantation/ Davie/ Pembroke Pines / Hollywood properties: Nuriver Landing, River House, Watergarden, Symphony, Las Olas Grand, 350 Las Olas Place, Icon Las Olas, Solmar on 6th, The Manor, Edge, Satori, Waverly, Radius, Sole, Tides, Las Olas by the River, Elan Sixteen Forty, Amli, Exchange Lofts, Nola Lofts, Mill Lofts, Foundry Lofts, Village East, Strada 315, New River Yacht Club, Plantation Manor, Dania Aisles,Sunrise Harbor, One Plantation, Pine Crest Village, Port Royale, Laurels at Jacaranda, Grove East, Lauderdale One, Sapphire, Modera, Broadstone Harbor Beach, The Edge, Vu new River, Las Olas Riverhouse, Overlook Pointe, Jefferson Lighthouse pointe, Luzano, Parc Station, Blu on Marina Boulevard, Villa Medici, Ora Flagler Village, The Queue, Bask, The Whitney, and Pearl']
